website_summaries.verdict: The addition of a fragrance cartridge makes this small-room air purifier a temptation for households with smokers or pets.
pros: HEPA-style filter captures 99% of dust, dander, and other particulates
Compact design for tabletop and nightstand use
cons: Scent cartridge does not have strong fragrance

customer_reviews.title: Removes cigarette smoke from home
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 nasty chain smoking adults that moved next door to my townhome. Their smoke comes in my house now and I HATE IT. I bought this and keep it on all the time in the kitchen by the powder room and garage door. NO MORE SMOKE SMELL! I bought 2 more for the upstairs bedroom and family room. My house is smoke stank free now!! I luv this product. I do not use the air freshner with it - I've smelled enough smells. Would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: DoTell

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I've been running this purifier almost 24/7 for close to two years now. I'm a smoker, but I don't want my house smelling like smoke all of the time. I have this in my living room with really high ceilings. I can tell a difference almost instantly if I have turned it off to have the windows open with fresh air, and forget to turn it back on again once the house is closed up again. I just run it on the medium setting when it is on. Very little noise. And it does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Jaccarnee

customer_reviews.title: A great sleek purifier helping my home
customer_reviews.text: I keep this in my kitchen dining area,also close to the opening and closing of the door.I'm happy with the results as it leaves a gentle air flow in the kitchen and I though I didn't buy it to cool,my kitchen isn't as hot as last Summer.It's helping with cleaning up my air though not 100% I feel nothing is. As for the smell I don't like strong perfume odors as it causes eye irritation with me and this doesn't.It's clean faint and doesn't overpower. The machine itself is sleek and doesn't take much space. The filters are easy to reorder from Amazon and change.Results are apparent.
customer_reviews.author: Jojo

customer_reviews.title: Works very nicely, but Amazon gets a 1 star on this
customer_reviews.text: Works very nicely, but Amazon gets a 1 star on this. The item came filthy dirty and covered in black dust. The coupon for free scent pods expired in January of 2016 so you know this must be from 2015. I have had a couple of experiences where Amazon is not taking care of customers like they used to. Very disappointing. Who knows how long it will work after sitting on the back of a shelf for 3 or 4 years.
customer_reviews.author: EMJ

customer_reviews.title: Nice filters, upkeep cost too much
customer_reviews.text: Love this tower filters, bought 2 for living room and bedroom and they help a lot with my allergies. My complaint is the cost of the replacement filters. Way too much for paper and thin foam. The scent packs smell great too however the smell only lasts a few days and the replacement of those is also way to much. When it comes time to replace again I'll be buying new towers and shopping for replacement filters first.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this,I've had it about 8 days now and within the first hour or so I could tell the air was cleaner and didn't feel as heavy,the linen & sky scent cartridge that came with it doesn't really spread threw out the room as much as I thought it would but that's fine with me I didn't want an overly powerful sent taking over the room anyways and I can smell hints of it of course more so when I've been out of the room for a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Dede

customer_reviews.title: Worst Product I Have Ever Purchased
customer_reviews.text: I have had this plugged in for an entire day in a 10X10 room and it has done absolutely NOTHING. I have never been so disappointed by a product in my life. I even tried turning the scent to the maximum and I don't smell it at all. I was so excited for this product after reading all of the great reviews. Either they are all fake reviews or the one that I received just happens to be a dud. I am so upset. If I could give this zero stars.. I would!
customer_reviews.author: John McGann

customer_reviews.title: Works as I hoped
customer_reviews.text: Did not get a remote with my unit so N/A. Purchased for my mother in law and appreciate the quiet running and the pleasant clean air in the area where the unit was placed. If it bothered her she would let me know or turn it off, but she has it on and running 24 hours a day. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Irene M.

customer_reviews.title: It is a little loud and sounds like a white noise machine
customer_reviews.text: I could almost immediately tell a difference in the air once I turned this on. It is a little loud and sounds like a white noise machine, but that is a perk for me. I haven't been able to smell the fragrance yet, but that isn't a big deal to me.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this. I could tell a difference within a few hours of turning it on. The smell of smoke has gone away. The air is lighter and easier to breath and scent is great. I use this in a small bedroom so its perfect. Plus I have noticed the amount of dust that would always cover all of the room has decreased
customer_reviews.author: PUP DOC

customer_reviews.title: Two cats in a small space is asking a lot but this deilvers.
customer_reviews.text: Two cat and two humans moved to a smaller condo with no outside space. For the first time in 15 years we started to notice smells from their box area. This unit running on low 24/7 had done the trick. Dust is significantly reduced and the 2 way filter does a good job on odors. No a fan of added fragrance, I have the scent thing set on its lowest point. All four of us seem happier.
customer_reviews.author: Bubby

customer_reviews.title: Nice Air Purifier.
customer_reviews.text: I've never had an air purifier before and I made the mistake of doing acrylic nails in a small space. I order this asap and while I do nails I put the monomer in front of the air purifier, and put The purifier the highest setting and keep it running even after I’m done doing nails for a couple of minutes and eventually it clears the smell out of the room and you never would know that I was doing nails and surprisingly even on the highest setting it’s not too loud.
customer_reviews.author: Karrie

customer_reviews.title: Ummmmm idk bout this overall
customer_reviews.text: I believe I wasted my money little bit. I purchased the product because I do nails in home and I hate the monomer smell. I seen this product review on YouTube and automatically added to my cart. It’s good to collect the dust when filing / e filing the nails but the scent I did not smell anything, I’ve tried to added just a tad of water to see if that will help break but nothing no scent came from this :(
customer_reviews.author: Monét

customer_reviews.title: Good bye litterbox odor!
customer_reviews.text: The scent cartridge barely gives off a scent. We use this in our bathroom where we have the litterbox for our 2 young cats. It has made a huge difference in controlling the litter-box-stink! If the scent cartridge was more effective I would have given it 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Luis Davila

customer_reviews.title: Noticeably improves air quality
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves this air purifier. First, it has a small footprint and sets on a table, chest of drawers or dresser easily. We have this in our bedroom and when we open the door, the air quality is noticeably better. The scent stick, if you choose to use it, will last about a month. Refills are about $10 for 2. The filter for the machine can be cleaned/vacuumed between replacement (about 4 months). Replacement filters cost about $20 for 2. Indicator lights will tell you when it's time to change the scent and filter. Notice this is a HEPA-TYPE purifier; it is not a true HEPA. Nevertheless it works very well, especially in a smaller, enclosed room.
customer_reviews.author: SouthernAmazoner

customer_reviews.title: Helps minimize strong monomer smell so worth the purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Since the pandemic I have been doing my nails at home with acrylic and I obviously don’t have the proper ventilation to eliminate the strong monomer smell. I personally don’t have an issue with the smell myself but it bothers my husband as he’s not used to it and it smells throughout the house. That being said, this did not eliminate the smell but most definitely minimized it. Keep in mind that monomer is strong so the fact that it helps, this would work great to neutralize smells in a room! The unit is not large but works! I would recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: N. Stickles

customer_reviews.title: Dont wast your money on this
customer_reviews.text: This product does not seem to clean the air or get rid of dust at all. I would return it but it works ok as a fan just to circulate air and i no longer have the box. Too much of a hassel. I bought an actual air purifier that does seem to do a very good job in my sons room. I may buy another one of those. Envion is good so far. Don't buy febreze.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph & Shonda  Irizarry

customer_reviews.title: Works like a champ and still runs well
customer_reviews.text: Had to buy a second one, this is so good! We had one for a year, then when we had a baby we put it in the nursery. It worked wonders when stinky diapers appeared. I don’t like the scent cartridges because I am picky, but it works well without and still removes stink from the air. Purchased another one for my room. Also helps because I am sensitive to mold and dust. Not as many headaches and colds now :) This video is our older filter
customer_reviews.author: Anka

customer_reviews.title: WIll buy more
customer_reviews.text: Magically changed my house from sneezing allergies to a nice clean environment
customer_reviews.author: FishingBaseball86

customer_reviews.title: I like the product however there is no smell at all ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the product however there is no smell at all from the febreze insert. Which is one of the reasons I purchased this one. It was a good price but a little disappointing that there is no febreze smell. The product itself is nice and a decent size.
customer_reviews.author: Tluv

customer_reviews.title: A must have for pet owners!
customer_reviews.text: I love it so much, I ordered a second! The scent isn't very noticeable, even on the highest setting, but the purification is out of this world! Even though the febreze scent isn't very strong, this purifier still keeps my house smelling fresh. As a person with three dogs, I absolutely love this thing!
customer_reviews.author: Sloan R.

customer_reviews.title: Good for price
customer_reviews.text: The only con I can find about this product, is that the scent filter does not last long, and you do have to replace it within a month or two, though I suppose that also has to do with how long you leave it on. Even without the scent, the air in our room smells much fresher, and the dustiness that we had on our furniture prior to purchasing this has definitely gone down!
customer_reviews.author: Mariah

customer_reviews.title: BIG Tower
customer_reviews.text: The product does work real good with refreshing the air, however I do not scent the air refresher at all and noise level is kind of loud in level 2-3.
customer_reviews.author: SA

customer_reviews.title: It’s alright
customer_reviews.text: I got this to reduce the odor of monomer as I do nails but I don’t feel that it really helps however it is very good as a dust Collector. Noise level is quite high once it to the highest setting but after a while you don’t even hear it anymore when you pay no attention to it. It is bulky so it cannot sit on a nail table
customer_reviews.author: GetDusted20

customer_reviews.title: the truth!!!! i looked for so ...
customer_reviews.text: the truth!!!! i looked for so many options to clean my air after cooking, especially curry chicken. This has saved me!
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Clean air within 24hrs!
customer_reviews.text: Quiet operation when you use at night fresh scent coming from the scent pad that is not overwhelming within a day we noticed a huge difference get my son's allergies and it's actually helps to clean the back half of our 3 bedroom home everyone's breathing a little easier and we plan on buying one or two more of these for the rest of the house
customer_reviews.author: Michael K St Germain

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Does a great job on 2 small rooms or 1 large room. Great for dust and odors!
customer_reviews.author: Damon&Shane

customer_reviews.title: Great air filter
customer_reviews.text: Love this air filter! Works great to get all the daily smells out of the air. Not super loud either. The only this is I wish the scent insert would last longer. Seems to stop giving off a scent after a couple of days... week at the most.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah K.

customer_reviews.title: Quite excellent, but kinda loud
customer_reviews.text: It's rather loud on high settings, the scent pod lasted maybe 3 weeks of constant use? Honestly the scent pod isn't a necessary feature and due to the price of them i haven't replaced it. It smelled fantastic while it lasted, and as an air filter, which is it's main purpose, it does an EXCELLENT job.
customer_reviews.author: Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Great so far after a few months. I run it daily and the filter light hasn’t come on yet. Sounds like your normal fan. Low speed can barely heard. The scent packs are a nice addition that most products like this don’t have.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Air Purifier
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good air purifier. If you are looking for scent, though, this probably won't be ideal for you. It is a little bit noisier than I would like, but it meets my needs overall.
customer_reviews.author: Janice

customer_reviews.title: Great for a few months
customer_reviews.text: It was a great air purifier for about three months. However just recently the purifier started to give off a electrical burning smell, and now one of the two fans is pulsating and making weird noises. Always keep air filters up to date. I'm too afraid to plug it in now.
customer_reviews.author: Corey Kindler

customer_reviews.title: Fresh scent, crisp air
customer_reviews.text: The scent is excellent!! Especially when wet Yorkies are coming in from a walk in the snow or rain.
customer_reviews.author: SS

customer_reviews.title: No scent
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to help minimize the smell of monomer when doing nails at home. However, the scent cartridge never produced a smell, even on high. I had to immediately purchase a new cartridge instead of using the one it came with. Other than that, it it as promised.
customer_reviews.author: Sharde' B.

customer_reviews.title: Going to buy another!! This does the job!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have to say, I stand amazed. I have a 200 sq ft nail studio, and you can't tell I do acrylic nails AT ALL. Best purchase EVER!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Eastland

customer_reviews.title: I smell.....nothing
customer_reviews.text: The air purifier part seems to work well, but as far as the scent goes that part may as well not even exist. I was really expecting more from a febreze product
customer_reviews.author: dazedsparklefairyTop Contributor: Cross-Stitch

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I smoke and we have an inside dog and a husband with allergies and we both can tell a difference in the air in the house
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Barnhill

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Works well, smells good and quiet compared to other machines out there
customer_reviews.author: Michael Haupt

customer_reviews.title: Died 5 months after purchasing it.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had mine for 5 months, and it just stopped working. For as much as I spent, plus filters and scent refills have gone up in price, I say find a better product. This one is junk.
customer_reviews.author: Dillon James

customer_reviews.title: Crisp Clean Air
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. The scent is just right not overpowering to give you a sinus headache. You can't hear it very low noise and worth the money. You get 1 filter 1 freshner which is the only thing I dislike.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Air Filter for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Relatively small. Effectively clears the air of pollen and dust.
customer_reviews.author: TxDiva

customer_reviews.title: My thoughts
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Has a lil noise. Great for small space
customer_reviews.author: Daphne

customer_reviews.title: I like the product however there is no smell at all ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the product however there is no smell at all from the febreze insert. Which is one of the reasons I purchased this one. It was a good price but a little disappointing that there is no febreze smell. The product itself is nice and a decent size.
customer_reviews.author: Tluv

customer_reviews.title: Horrible product! No change in air and no scent!
customer_reviews.text: Loud on high... quiet on low... Even on high still no scent or anything no matter how long it was on the air never changed
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: Great value.
customer_reviews.text: Works well in smaller rooms. Does what it’s supposed to do. I bought two :-). Great value but a little nosier than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Chillami

customer_reviews.title: Super strong
customer_reviews.text: I like this and the beginning I can tell that. It was working but not now but I been running it for two months straight
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... wanted this for our bedroom so we can sleep better, seeing great results after the first night
customer_reviews.text: Wife wanted this for our bedroom so we can sleep better, seeing great results after the first night. Now she is thinking about getting another for the kids room. Excellent product for the price
customer_reviews.author: James Bonifacio

customer_reviews.title: House smells great!
customer_reviews.text: I got this to keep the smoke smell out of my house from friends and family. It worked like a charm and I've had no issue with the smell at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality and price
customer_reviews.text: I use this product in my bedroom because I have two dogs that sleep with me. Low noise and you can adjust how much scent you want. you can also adjust the noise.
customer_reviews.author: theresa sparrow

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Great for the money.. easy replacement if filters on amazon
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Mac

customer_reviews.title: We use it every day in the baby's room to ...
customer_reviews.text: We use it every day in the baby's room to help filter out the poo smells and provide some white noise. Works well!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Moritz

customer_reviews.title: No smell
customer_reviews.text: Gives off absolutely no smell at all. The scent cartridge is very strong when u smell it but putting it in the air purifier you don’t smell anything at all, very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Peyton

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase! Even though it is a little noisy when it is on the highest level, it does the work, keep bad smells from your house, only bad thing is that the scent is that strong, you can barely smell it.
customer_reviews.author: Lizbeth Navarrete

customer_reviews.title: Love it !!
customer_reviews.text: I use this for nails and when I say I love it !!! Great purchase follow me on Instagram @Desbeautysuite
customer_reviews.author: Desiree michel

customer_reviews.title: I purchased new received used
customer_reviews.text: I’m trying to figure out why I purchased a brand new machine but apparently received a product that was previously opened. The box is banged and and it’s taped close.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does a great job and very quiet at low
customer_reviews.text: Does a great job and very quiet at low. I dont use the scent function as we are trying to clean the air not pump it full of chemical Funk.
customer_reviews.author: Misarakedad

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Didn't do much. Should have spend the money on a higher quality unit. Also too loud.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: No scent but does clean air
customer_reviews.text: I just set it up yesterday and still can't smell any scent. It does seem to clean the air which is a plus. Just no scent
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I would not buy this. I bought it specifically for nails because the smell is so strong, I tried the air purifier and it did not take the smell away, so now my room smells like monomer. Smh
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Can't smell the febreze insert
customer_reviews.text: Super disappointed in this item. I can not even smell the febreeze insert. I got rid of my other air purifier because I wanted one that gave off a scent as well. I read the reviews and they were all great, but not accurate. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Speshelk

customer_reviews.title: Scent does not spread in to the room as much ...
customer_reviews.text: Scent does not spread in to the room as much as I had thought. Will continue to use so I can rule out pilot error.
customer_reviews.author: Karl Hutchison

customer_reviews.title: I am amazingly happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: Omg!!! I am amazingly happy with this product. It has surpassed my expectations. I have ran this 24hrs since I received it and can breathe and see the difference. We are not having any allergies and the dust has cut down emensley
customer_reviews.author: kim geisler

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Best money I spent buying this for my baby helped his allergy plus that smell ahhhh!!! The best thing EVER I promise you won’t regret it’s also quiet
customer_reviews.author: Jasceth Francis

customer_reviews.title: Smells good
customer_reviews.text: Fan is a little noisy But I definitely smell the cartridge when I open the door to the house.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Good for Cleaning, HORRIBLE for scent.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome because it moves air like a fan with the benefit of a thick filter in the back to filter the air, but don't buy this to make you house smell good... The air freshener is nothing more than a joke. I never ONCE smelled it in my small living room and I had it set to full blast.
customer_reviews.author: Chris G

customer_reviews.title: It works.
customer_reviews.text: Love it. It takes out cat litter smells, cigarette smells, and kitchen smells. Gives off a nice fresh scent. Going to get 3 more soon.
customer_reviews.author: Pauline DeJohn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a great air purifier for the money. We have three of them.
customer_reviews.author: Janie M.

customer_reviews.title: Scent doesn’t smell in room
customer_reviews.text: The air felt more clean but the scent you could barely smell
customer_reviews.author: Pam Bramer

customer_reviews.title: Able to breathe with cats!!
customer_reviews.text: Originally I bought the smaller one which has 1 filter- worked really well in normal size bedroom. So happy with it we bought the double filter size for central area of house- kitchen/living room. Definitely makes a difference with a severe cat allergy. The scent part of it doesn't make a big difference, but we weren't buying it for that reason anyway so I'm not going to replace scent filter after it's used up. 3 settings are available which I alternate which one we use. The 1st setting is nearly silent! I have not tried other brands to actually compare it to, but very happy with febreeze brand purifiers!!
customer_reviews.author: Deirdre

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Bought it because I live in apt and ppl below me like to cook very pungent foods that permeates my apt. This reduces it by about 80% so I love it! Only downside is the scent reset light never turns off. But it doesn’t affect the machine so not a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Anne S.

customer_reviews.title: Value for my money
customer_reviews.text: Noise level is very low, it does not keep the air as fresh as I am as hoping for
customer_reviews.author: Maribel

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Works well & like the addition of an air freshener if needed!
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: love it, it runs all day long
customer_reviews.text: love it , it runs all day long, keeps my bedroom fresh, and I do not know it's even there.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Kieth Lowe

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and it shows
customer_reviews.text: The scent diffuser just doesn't work. It's so weak. The filter is very cheap feeling.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Barnette

customer_reviews.title: ... describe - Works well - Move the air - love the replaceable air freshener inserts
customer_reviews.text: As describe - Works well - Move the air - love the replaceable air freshener inserts
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Got rid of all of the odors in our family room from the dogs! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: M. C. Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: I like how quiet it is
customer_reviews.text: I just received yesterday. I like how quiet it is. My mom has one &I it works well.
customer_reviews.author: vampca

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice air. Takes care of pet odors and dust. I have bought two.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Fresh air!
customer_reviews.text: I love this air purifier! It works so well, and the sound it makes is a nice sound to fall asleep to!
customer_reviews.author: Paige B

customer_reviews.title: Works well but
customer_reviews.text: Works well but, I do not smell the the Febreze insert at all.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Didn't notice any differance
customer_reviews.text: I bought several of these and didn't notice any significant difference.
customer_reviews.author: Che'

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: helps clean the air and smells great with fabreze cartridge
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: A bit loud
customer_reviews.text: Works very well, and happy with purchase. Rids my home of smoke and odor.
customer_reviews.author: very pleased

customer_reviews.title: Great for small room
customer_reviews.text: These are the perfect size for a small room. Easy to use and set up.
customer_reviews.author: Cole Hardy

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: It has served its purpose well. Definitely better worth the money. My boyfriend’s allergies are noticeably better. We have it in the bedroom. There is less dust on furniture as well.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected. No complaints so far.
customer_reviews.text: This purifier has been on since the day I got it in the mail. I have gone through 4 filters to date. It runs 24/7 and the filters have filled up, to capacity, in roughly 3-4 weeks. I am very satisfied with the perfomance of it and its ability to clean dust, from the air, in my apartment. I should probably buy another one, but that is for another discussion. I recommend it and will most likely be buying another one in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: GRRRR

customer_reviews.title: It's PERFECT! We no longer wake up with sore throats ...
customer_reviews.text: After researching which type of air purifier to purchase based on size and price for a travel trailer to fight dust and mold in the air, I chose this model. It's PERFECT! We no longer wake up with sore throats and headaches. The whole trailer smells better. It was shocking to see how much dirt, dust, etc. was actually being caught in the filter. I strongly recommend this for smaller spaces. I plan to purchase another for our game room in the basement.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry

customer_reviews.title: Sound Quality
customer_reviews.text: The product is extremely loud and if used at night could disrupt sleep. Also, have not experienced the Febreze effect (no smell).
customer_reviews.author: Eugene Williams

customer_reviews.title: best air purifier we have tried
customer_reviews.text: Have had many air purifiers in our bedroom, honeywell, holmes, you name it we've had it. This one is small and quiet yet does its job extremely well. The relatively low price point is the icing on the cake. Great air purifier! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: TLC

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: I used now for almost one year, the only problem is to make work and filter the air you should make the fan third speed, so noisy.
customer_reviews.author: Mo

customer_reviews.title: When I ordered this I wasn't expecting the best. However this exceeded my expectations
customer_reviews.text: When I ordered this I wasn't expecting the best. However this exceeded my expectations. We have a cat and a dog and it does a wonderful job of containing the pet dander as well as actually working almost like a fan.
customer_reviews.author: Marshall S.

customer_reviews.title: No more sneezing !
customer_reviews.text: Already owned 2 of these and they have been running non-stop for over 2 years. No issues. They are quiet and easy to clean. We estimate they reduce our dusting needs by 50%/ We do not always operate them with the fragrance insert, but if you do, the low setting is more than sufficient for most rooms to smell nice is a couple of hours. Be very careful where you put the scent insert if it is opened and you want to take it out for awhile. Put some foil or plastic wrap over the holes, because if you lay it down on a piece of furniture, the finish will bubble & it'll strip the finish right off.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Happy With Our Purchase
customer_reviews.text: This machine is just right for our bedroom. My husband and I noticed a difference in the air quality the first night we used it. Also, the machine produces "white noise" that can help lull one to sleep. We like the adjustable controls as well.
customer_reviews.author: PWSM

customer_reviews.title: No scent cartridge came with it, decent otherwise.
customer_reviews.text: The item did not come with any scent cartridges. It came well packaged and in working order and seems to do it's job. It showed up one day later than expected... and no scent cartridges.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Sagstetter

customer_reviews.title: Worth the buy
customer_reviews.text: I have hardwood floors that attracted too much dust and found myself sweeping way too often. I have a newborn son that I didn't want to be inhaling too of it, so I bought this air purifier to get rid of some of the dust and pet dander, and I must say it is definitely working. We keep it on low and it's enough to keep our floors with a very significant and noticeable decrease of dust on the floor.
customer_reviews.author: w90watson

customer_reviews.title: ... is exactly what I was looking for at a great price. Item arrived quickly and on time
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for at a great price. Item arrived quickly and on time. I t was as described and it has been working perfectly on a daily basis, thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Percha

customer_reviews.title: Does a Good Job
customer_reviews.text: I have a 12 X 12 bedroom and this unit works well if I close the doors and fun it on "high" (rather loud) for an hour before bedtime. Then I switch it to "low" and it is quiet enough to allow me to go to sleep without any problems. I do notice the change in air quality and it has helped my nighttime stuffy nose a lot. The only drawback is that it does not have a timer, which would be useful to me.
customer_reviews.author: Patk6789

customer_reviews.title: Love this purifier
customer_reviews.text: Works better than expected I can definitely notice a big difference in the air. I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Tara W

customer_reviews.title: Love this machine
customer_reviews.text: Use this in my kitchen. I run it 24/7 on high setting and it takes care of kitchen odors.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia L. Lucy

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied so far
customer_reviews.text: Only been running for a couple hours but I can feel a difference in the air already. I have the smell turned way down as I don't really like the Linen smell that came with it... smells off to me however I'm pregnant and my nose hates pretty much everything... It does make noise however it's a FAN so was expected. I do think it's disappointing that filters have to be changes every 4 months when the other helps filters I have or at least 6 months... I will update later as I have it for a longer period of time
customer_reviews.author: jayTop Contributor: Baby

product_meta.title: Febreze FHT170W HEPA-Type Tabletop Air Purifier
product_meta.description: Style Name:TabletopFebreze HEPA-Type tabletop air purifier captures up to 99% of airborne particles such as dust, pollen, smoke & pet dander. Adds Febreze fresh scent to the filtered air. Febreze freshness scent control dial. HEPA-Type filter w/ integrated pre-filter.
feature_bullets: Electronic filter and scent replacement indicators
To ensure stated product performance, use only Genuine Febreze Filters
Dual-action HEPA-type filter captures up to 99% of airborne pollutants & allergens such as dust, smoke, pollen and pet hair & dander that passes through the filter
